TextLibrary.Text: Back again? Good good. Neehi needs you to do one last thing. He will pay you VERY well.
Back again? Good good. Neehi needs you to do one last thing. He will pay you VERY well.
Back again? Good good. Neehi needs you to do one last thing. He will pay you VERY well.
Back again? Good good. Neehi needs you to do one last thing. He will pay you VERY well.
Neehi needs you to travel over the mountains again. Take the tree-limb and the axe-head to the Dwarven Smith in Gallia. He will forge them into an axe.
Neehi needs you to travel over the mountains again. Take the tree-limb and the axe-head to the Dwarven Smith in Gallia. He will forge them into an axe.
Neehi needs you to travel over the mountains again. Take the tree-limb and the axe-head to the Dwarven Smith in Gallia. He will forge them into an axe.
Neehi needs you to travel over the mountains again. Take the tree-limb and the axe-head to the Dwarven Smith in Gallia. He will forge them into an axe.
I'll be back as soon as I can.
